select MODEL_ID as modelId, SERIAL_NUM as serialNum, DEVICE_NAME as deviceName, DEVICE_MAC as deviceMac, PRODUCT_CODE as productCode, REPORT_TIME as reportTime, CMD_NAME as cmdName, "POSITION" as position, STATE as state, SPARE as spare, PRODUCT_CODE_NAME as productCodeName from CDCOCKPIT_DEVICE_REPORT where 1=1 and PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode}

SELECT v.MODEL_ID as modelId, v.SERIAL_NUM as serialNum, v.DEVICE_NAME as deviceName, v.DEVICE_MAC as deviceMac, v.PRODUCT_CODE as productCode, v.REPORT_TIME as reportTime, v.CMD_NAME as cmdName, v."POSITION" as position, v.STATE as state, v.SPARE as spare, v.PRODUCT_CODE_NAME as productCodeName FROM CDCOCKPIT_DEVICE_REPORT v RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT SERIAL_NUM, MAX( REPORT_TIME ) REPORT_TIME FROM CDCOCKPIT_DEVICE_REPORT GROUP BY SERIAL_NUM ) t ON v.SERIAL_NUM = t.SERIAL_NUM AND v.REPORT_TIME = t.REPORT_TIME where 1=1 and v.PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode} and v.CMD_NAME = #{cmdName} and v.REPORT_TIME >= #{startTime} order by v.REPORT_TIME
